name: Private Room Near Harvard, BU and Downtown Boston!
neighborhood_overview: Allston's neighborhood is quite vibrant! With lots of great restaurants, bars and quick access to Cambridge and downtown Boston and well as Boston University, Boston College, Harvard Business School, MIT, Harvard University, Fenway Park, the I90 highway and so much more!
description: Spacious room with great closet space, comfy bed, quiet work space, and all the amenities needed. Room is in a completely renovated house, large kitchen w/ great cabinet space, granite counter tops, stainless steel appliances, and renovated bathrooms. Large common areas. Just 3 minutes from Harvard Ave train station (Green line) and a short distance to restaurants, banks, bars, Fenway Park, Boston University, Harvard Business School, Harvard University, MIT, Back Bay, parks, and downtown Boston.
